name: FROG DUTY
description:
You knew this day would come. The company's greed has yet again invoked divine punishment. Now you, assigned "employee of the month" must fight for your life in order to save the office.

- CONTROLS -
WASD - Walk
Space - Jump
Shift - Run
R - Reload
Left-click - Shoot
Right-click - Pick up/Throw fire extinguisher

Made during 7DFPS 2022. Special thanks to Simon Brander for making us fried chicken during the jam!!
